content: this is a charming little afghan square that can be worked in a variety of colors to achieve your own unique look you will be pleased with the finished results as it will add a little touch of beauty to your crochet project rated easy gauge through round 2 = 2 25 through round 5 = 4 75 through round 6 = 5 special stitches used begcl cluster fpsc dcdec and optional surface crochet come join me in my ravelry group - melinda miller designs 1 where we host cals test my new patterns and just enjoy some crochet fun 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/melinda-miller-designs
